listeningQuestion.question: What will surprise the writer's sister when she comes to England?
listeningQuestion.translation: 作者的姐姐来英国时，什么事会让她感到惊讶？

editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个关于新居的故事，重点介绍了complete、modern、strange等词的用法，以及there is和it is的区别。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
notes: I had a letter from my sister yesterday. She lives in Nigeria.
In her letter, she said that she would come to England next year.
If she comes, she will get a surprise.
We are now living in a beautiful new house in the country.
Work on it had begun before my sister left.
The house was completed five months ago.
In my letter, I told her that she could stay with us.
The house has many large rooms and there is a lovely garden.
It is a very modern house, so it looks strange to some people.
It must be the only modern house in the district.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 昨天我收到了姐姐的一封信，她住在尼日利亚。
在信中她说她明年将到英国来。
如果她来了，她会感到非常惊奇了。
我们现在住在乡间的一栋漂亮的新住宅里。
这栋房子在我姐姐离开之前就已动工了，
是在5个月以前竣工的。
我在信中告诉她，她可以和我们住在一起。
这栋房子里有许多房间，还有一个漂亮的花园。
它是一栋非常现代化的住宅，因此在有些人看来很古怪。
它肯定是这个地区唯一的一栋现代化住宅。

vocabulary.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.toggle: adj. 完全的；完整的；彻底的
adj. 现代的，近代的；时髦的
notes.meaning: adj. 新式的，与以往不同的

notes.toggle: adj. 陌生的；奇怪的；外行的

notes.title: get a surprise的用法
content: 1. get a surprise 感到惊奇（surprise作可数名词，指'令人惊奇的事'）
2. to one's surprise = I get a shock 吃了一惊
3. surprise也可以作不可数名词，表示'惊讶' - She looked at the man in surprise

notes.title: 形容词词序
content: 1. 离名词最近的词跟该词的关系最密切
3. 例如：a beautiful new house, a big red flag

notes.title: There is 和 It is的区别
content: 1. there be结构用于说明或询问人或物的存在
2. 在用there表示存在后，用it或人称代词作进一步说明
3. it作为'虚主语'表示时间、距离、天气等概念时，不能用there be结构
4. 例如：There's a bus coming, but it's full.

notes.context: work作抽象的不可数名词时，'……的工作'后面必须用介词on
notes.example: Work on the new building had begun.
He stayed with his uncle last week.
The house was completed five months ago.
The house looks strange to some people.

multipleChoice.question: When was the house completed?
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中明确提到'The house was completed five months ago'

multipleChoice.question: Why does the house look strange to some people?
options: Because it is in the country
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中说'It is a very modern house, so it looks strange to some people'

fillInBlanks.sentence: The house was _____ five months ago.
It must be the only _____ house in the district.
fillInBlanks.hint: 表示'现代化的'的形容词

notes.title: 词语辨析
notes.content: complete和finish都表示'完成'，但complete更多用于建筑工程等大型项目的完工，而finish更常用于日常事务的完成，如finish homework（完成作业）。

notes.title: 地区相关词汇辨析
notes.content: district（地区）通常指行政划分的区域，area（地段）指某个范围的区域，region（地带）则指具有某些共同特征的较大区域。
